title: Stellar Blade Review - PS I Love You XOXO Ep. 215
description:
Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames

How does Shift Up's PlayStation exclusive fare? Let's find out from Blessing! Note: Game provided by PlayStation for review.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:00:40 - Welcomes & Housekeeping
00:04:33 - “What is your best handheld gaming memory?” - Tony
00:09:30 - Stellar Blade Review
00:44:36 - Does Sony’s new PlayStation PC overlay and shared Trophies make Andy and Bless care about Trophies?
00:50:19 - PlayStation Picks
